trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Allentown
There were no other sightings in Allentown on or around November 30th 1954
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for the grade school doors to open and I saw something larger than the sun in the Eastrn sky. I was wondering all these years if anyone else saw something. I've looked at dozens of google page images and haven't seen anything like I remember.
